title: 820-3437 no cam
message:
Hi
Got an 820-3437 with 'no camera connected' here. Never really dug into no camera issues that far.

It has 5V on the connector. I decided to check the filters on the backside, all resistance was fine, i checked them for any mall voltage/signal and it was present. But as i was checking this i saw smoke from the other side of the board. Now we have no signals/activity of any kind on the MIPI_DATA lines. 

I couldn't locate the burnt area, It looks like it came from the connector itself however the connector has no visable damage, ive inspected both the inside pins and external condition of the connector and there is nothing visibly damaged. 

any help would be appreciated.
Thanks

title: 820-3437 no cam
message: Only thing that can smoke is L4010. Also did you even try another LCD with camera?

title: 820-3437 no cam
message:
L4010 measures okay,
Yes another assembly has been tried.
Thanks

title: 820-3437 no cam
message: Not much else besides U3900 then. I would not bother with that....
